scripts.prepack: ../../scripts/nws.sh build -d && pipenv run python setup.py bdist_wheel
scripts.start: ../../scripts/nws.sh build -d && rm -rf run && mkdir -p run && RMF_API_SERVER_CONFIG=sqlite_local_config.py pipenv run python -m api_server
scripts.test:cov: ../../scripts/nws.sh build -d && pipenv run python -m coverage run scripts/test.py
scripts.test:report: pipenv run python -m coverage html && xdg-open htmlcov/index.html
scripts.lint: pipenv run pyright && pipenv run pylint api_server --ignore=ros_pydantic,rmf_api
